remarks: Lemma for ~ prmrec .  Show by induction that the indexed (nondisjoint) union ` W `` k ` is at most the size of the prime reciprocal series. The key counting lemma is ~ hashdvds , to show that the number of numbers in ` 1 ... N ` that divide ` k ` is at most ` N / k ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Aug-2014.)
